title: Paranormal Investigators - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/24/18
itunes:title: Paranormal Investigators - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/24/18
description:
George Noory and sociologist Dr. Marc Eaton examine his research into what motivates people to investigate paranormal events, as well as some of the most extreme experiences he's been involved with.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
